scripts.docker: docker compose build && docker compose down && docker compose up
scripts.build: npm run test && mkdir -p dist/public/api && npm run build-client && npm run build-server && cp -r dist/client/* dist/public && cp -r dist/server/* dist/public/api
scripts.build-client: mkdir -p dist/client && (cd client && npm run build) && cp -r ./client/out/* dist/client
